meaningMnemonic: We're moving towards <kanji>one</kanji> <kanji>approximation</kanji>. It used to be more approximations, but now it's just one, and because it's just one it's not really an approximation anymore. It's <vocabulary>unconditionally</vocabulary> set. It's set <vocabulary>as a rule</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
